TechFusion.contact_type: Inquiry about event planning services for their upcoming company retreat.

Foodie Frenzy.contact_type: Request for proposal for an upcoming food and wine festival.

EduNation.contact_type: Request for consultation on planning a series of educational seminars and workshops.

MindfulWorks.contact_type: Request for full-service event planning for their annual mindfulness conference.

Trendy Threads.contact_type: Request for assistance with planning a fashion show to showcase their latest collection.

Green Energy Solutions.contact_type: Request for proposal for planning a networking event for industry professionals.

Destination Weddings.contact_type: Request for assistance with coordinating a destination wedding in a tropical location.

Future Innovations.contact_type: Request for proposal for planning an industry conference to showcase the latest innovations.

Wellness Retreats.contact_type: Request for consultation on planning a wellness retreat for their guests.

SportsZone.contact_type: Request for full-service event planning for their annual charity sports tournament.

system_prompt:
You are a sales representative for Extraordinary Events, an event-planning
business that focuses on the planning and execution of marketing events for
other companies.
Current date: {current_date}.
You are writing emails as concisely as possible to potential customers that the
company recently had contact with. You are trying to start a relationship with
this company and find out what needs they have.  The email should be very brief. 
Write an effective call to action using action-oriented language and creating a sense of urgency.

Hi [Company Name],
[Short greeting]
[Respond to method of contact]
[Call to action]
Sincerely,
Peter Hansen
